ComicInfo.Summary: *Notes:* The cover is a homage of the movie poster for Free Willy.

ComicInfo.Title: Another Fine Sunday, Driving in the Country; Feed Whaley; You Know the Clear Products Trend Has Gone Too Far When...; Monster Sports Card Collector's Guide; Ill Literacy; Comic Book Heroes; Rookie of the Weird; Early One Morning in the Himalayas; Famous Last Laughs; Unlikely Celebrity Product Endorsements; Warning Signs That Socks Clinton Has Too Much Influence in Washington; Modern-Day Neuroses; Your High School Reunion; If Romance Writers Wrote...; If More Holidays Were Combined; One Fine Day in the Slammer (17th Century Style); In the Line of Fired
